about_the_game:
A brand new sports game that combines a FPS and a basketball game has finally arrived from Japan!
The way to play is simple and clear. Players control a character of their choice and carry the ball by making full use of passing and jumping.
Points are awarded for hitting the ball into the opposing team's goal, and the team that scores the most points wins.

The rules are similar to basketball, but there are no fouls or penalties!
You can cover your teammates by sniping them from a distance with a sniper.
Or you can get close to the ball carrier and take him out with your shotgun.
Team up and get as many points as you can!

The game is intuitive and fun for everyone, from beginners to experts.
Beginners will enjoy the fun and excitement of the game, while advanced players will enjoy the tactics and positioning.
Advanced players can play basketball as a team, making full use of tactics and positions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7500 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or over
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7700 or over
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or over
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: "Plairdes" is a free-to-play sports shooter developed by Meta Earth. Take control of your favorite character and work with your friends to score goals and win! Immediately experience the tactical depth of coordinated play and innovative gameplay.
